content.description: Crank the steep pocketed face past three bolts to the top.
content.location: this buttress is located a few yards downhill of Trundlasaurus.  Look for the bolted line up the middle of the steep face.

content.description:
Squeeze job next to Plane above your head. You can also use these bolts for double rope practice with Plane Above Your Head.

Follow the bolts to the overhang.

VARIATIONS

Arete(5.10) - Climb to the third bolt but then make your way on to the arete. Careful of the potential swing when leading.

Direct(5.10+) - Stay on the face but utilize the jugs cliff left after climbing past the bolt (See the picture, my left hand is on a thank goodness jug)

Super Direct (5.11-) - Stay on the face avoiding the jugs out left.
content.protection: Four bolts to a cold shuts anchor with a bolted chain backup. Bring longer slings / webbing / cordelette if you don't want rope drag otherwise two opposing draws will do.
content.location:
This wall can be accessed by walking down and cliff right of Red Wall. Walk past New Policy Wall and head right and up hill. A vague path is somewhat visible.

This is the bolted line on the left of Plane Above Your Head Wall.
